iree_add_all_subdirs()

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    defs
  INCLUDES
    "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src>"
    "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/src>"
  PUBLIC
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    registration
  SRCS
    "src/PluginRegistration.cpp"
  DEPS
    ::IR
    #::Transforms
    ::defs
    MLIRIR
    MLIRPass
    iree::compiler::PluginAPI
  PUBLIC
)

iree_compiler_register_plugin(
  PLUGIN_ID
    async
  TARGET
    ::registration
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    IR
  HDRS
    "src/async/IR/Async.h"
    "src/async/IR/AsyncOps.h.inc"
  SRCS
    "src/async/IR/Async.cpp"
    "src/async/IR/AsyncOps.cpp.inc"
  DEPS
    ::AsyncOpsGen
    ::defs
    LLVMSupport
    MLIRFuncDialect
    MLIRIR
    MLIRSupport
  PUBLIC
)

iree_tablegen_library(
  NAME
    AsyncOpsGen
  TD_FILE
    "src/async/IR/AsyncOps.td"
  OUTS
    --gen-dialect-decls src/async/IR/AsyncDialect.h.inc
    --gen-dialect-defs src/async/IR/AsyncDialect.cpp.inc
    --gen-op-decls src/async/IR/AsyncOps.h.inc
    --gen-op-defs src/async/IR/AsyncOps.cpp.inc
    --gen-typedef-decls -typedefs-dialect=async /src/async/IR/AsyncTypes.h.inc
    --gen-typedef-defs -typedefs-dialect=async /src/async/IR/AsyncTypes.cpp.inc
)

iree_tablegen_doc(
  NAME
    AsyncDialectDocGen
  TD_FILE
    "src/async/IR/AsyncOps.td"
  OUTS
    --gen-dialect-doc -dialect=async src/async/IR/AsyncDialect.md
)
